profileAlternative.name: Victor Amin
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Data Scientist at The Trade Desk
profileAlternative.summary: 10 years of experience applying machine learning and statistical techniques to large datasets in a wide variety of domains, including security, genomics, physical chemistry, email, IoT, education, and now ad-tech. I am at home working cross-functionally to evaluate business impact and find the right solutions to the most valuable problems. I excel at communicating with and about data—I am an award-winning public speaker and have been invited to speak internationally.

items: How Data Latency Kills Creativity (and What You Can Do About It)
Ligand-Mediated Control of the Confinement Potential in Semiconductor Quantum Dots
Synthesis of a novel pd/au cyanogel and physiochemical investigations of the cyanogel system
